SELECT e.publishMonth , e.className , SUM(CASE WHEN e.rank = 1 THEN e.publishValue ELSE 0 END) AS firstWeekValue , SUM(CASE WHEN e.rank = 2 THEN e.publishValue ELSE 0 END) AS secondWeekValue , SUM(CASE WHEN e.rank = 3 THEN e.publishValue ELSE 0 END) AS thirdWeekValue , SUM(CASE WHEN e.rank = 4 THEN e.publishValue ELSE 0 END) AS forthWeekValue , SUM(CASE WHEN e.rank = 5 THEN e.publishValue ELSE 0 END) AS fifthWeekValue FROM( SELECT c.*, IF(@p=c.publishMonth,@r:=@r+1,@r:=1) AS rank, @p:=c.publishMonth FROM( SELECT CASE WHEN b.publishWeek = 0 OR (b.publishWeek = 1 AND b.rank = 1) THEN DATE_FORMAT(SUBDATE(b.publishDay,INTERVAL 1 MONTH) ,'%Y-%m') ELSE b.publishMonth END AS publishMonth, b.publishDay , b.className , b.publishValue FROM( SELECT a.* , IF(@p=a.publishMonth,@r:=@r+1,@r:=1) AS rank, @p:=a.publishMonth FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(( CASE WHEN LENGTH(publish_day) = 13 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,10),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,9),'%Y-%m-%d') END ),'%Y-%m') publishMonth, ((DAY( CASE WHEN LENGTH(publish_day) = 13 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,10),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,9),'%Y-%m-%d') END )+WEEKDAY(( CASE WHEN LENGTH(publish_day) = 13 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,10),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,9),'%Y-%m-%d') END )-INTERVAL DAY( CASE WHEN LENGTH(publish_day) = 13 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,10),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,9),'%Y-%m-%d') END ) DAY)) DIV 7) publishWeek, CASE WHEN LENGTH(publish_day) = 13 THEN FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,10),'%Y-%m-%d') ELSE FROM_UNIXTIME(LEFT(publish_day,9),'%Y-%m-%d') END AS publishDay , sub_index_class className , publish_value publishValue FROM contry_macro_economy_index WHERE class_code = #{indexCode} AND contry_class = '美国' ) a,(SELECT @p:=NULL,@r:=0)r ) b ) c ,(SELECT @p:=NULL,@r:=0)r
AND c.publishMonth >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDay} ,'%Y-%m')
AND c.publishMonth < DATE_FORMAT(#{endDay} ,'%Y-%m')
ORDER BY c.publishDay ) e GROUP BY e.publishMonth ORDER BY e.publishMonth
